alert.note: Alert for Chatham (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 21 at 5:13PM EDT until May 21 at 6:15PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM EDT FOR NORTHWESTERN WAKE...NORTHEASTERN CHATHAM AND SOUTHERN DURHAM COUNTIES... At 512 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near RDU International, or near Cary, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Trained spotter. At least nickel sized 1 mile northwest of Carpenter. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Raleigh, Durham, Cary, RDU International, Morrisville, Gorman, William B Umstead State Park, Parkwood, Research Triangle and Falls Lake Boat Ramp. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Prepare immediately for large hail and damaging winds. People outside should move to a shelter, inside a strong building and away from windows.
